property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Remove all location, treachery and objective cards that do not pertain to the Through the Folds encounter set. Remove from the encounter deck all the Captain and Route cards, and set aside, out of play. Add Edoras Hills to the staging area. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value:
After the 5th progress token is placed here, add Bounty Hunter to the staging area.
Unless Bounty Hunter is in the victory display, the players cannot defeat this stage.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Add The White Mountains to the staging area.

property.name: Text
property.value:
After the 5th progress token is placed here, add Junkorlg to the staging area.
Unless Junkorlg is in the victory display, the players cannot defeat this stage.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Add Mindolluin and Ghulat to the staging area.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Reaching Minas Tirich gets +1 quest point for each attachment and ally in play.
If the players defeat this stage, they have won the game.

property.name: Text
property.value:
X is the number of attachments in play.
Forced: At the beginning of the encounter phase, Bounty Hunter engages the player with least attachments under his control.

property.name: Text
property.value:
X is the number of allies in play.
Forced: After Junkorlg attacks, the defending player chooses and faces down an ally he controls, that ally becomes out of his control.

property.name: Keywords
property.value:
Alert 2.
Indestructible.
Immune to player card effects.

property.name: Text
property.value:
X is the specified alert value.
Response: Damage tokens on Ghulat count as a victory points when the players win the game.

property.name: Text
property.value: Treat all the attachment cards of the attacking or defending characters against the Forest Assailant as if their printed text box were blank.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Choose and discard an attachment from the defending character.

property.name: Text
property.value: X is the specified alert value.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Alert 1.
Forced: After Orc Troop is defeated, attach it to a hero controlled by the first player. While attached, counts as a Condition attachment.

property.name: Text
property.value:
X is the specified alert value.
Forced: At the beginning of the encounter phase, Monitoring Time engages the player who triggers the Alert keyword.

property.name: Keywords
property.value:
Immune to player card effects.
Players cannot travel here.

property.name: Text
property.value:
X is the number of attachments in play.
Forced: No more than 5 progress tokens can be placed on the current quest card each round. After players advance to stage 2, remove Edoras Hills from the game.

property.name: Keywords
property.value:
Immune to player card effects.
Players cannot travel here.

property.name: Text
property.value:
X is the number of allies in play.
Forced: No more than 5 progress tokens can be placed on the current quest card each round. After players advance to stage 3, remove The White Mountains from the game.

property.name: Keywords
property.value:
Alert 2.
Immune to player card effects.
Players cannot travel here.

property.name: Text
property.value:
X is the specified alert value.
Forced: After travelling to a Mountain location, each player may choose and ready a character he controls.

property.name: Text
property.value: Sinister Caves gets +1 quest point for each victory point.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: The attacking enemy gets +1 Ú for each victory point.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Steep Streams is in the staging area enemies get -5 engagement cost.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Chose a non unique enemy in the stagng area and engage him, then return the attachking enemy to the staging area after it attacks.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: The attacking enemy gets +1 Û for each Mountain location in the staging area.

property.name: Text
property.value: X is the number of the attachments from the player who controls most.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Attacking enemy makes an additional attack immediately after this one.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player discards X cards from his hand. X is the number of allies under his control.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: The defending player discards a random card from his hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Deal 2 damage to each ally in play. Each player can pay X resources to choose X allies and reduce their damage to 0.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player must deal X damage among the characters under his control. X is the total cost of the attachments he controls.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Deal 1 damage to the defending character.

property.name: Text
property.value: To calculate the Alert Value, first determine the highest number of allies or attachments controlled by a single player. Then multiply that number by the Alert number to calculate the value of X.
